QuestData.Title: Learn to Ride at the Exodar
QuestData.Description: This pamphlet advertising riding training and mount purchases was sent from Aalun.$B$BAalun can be found at the entrance to the Exodar on Azuremyst Isle.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return this pamphlet to Aalun outside the Exodar on Azuremyst Isle.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ah, you received my letter? Good.
QuestData.RewardText: So, shall we begin your Apprentice Riding training?
